title: Textile, early–mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with twill patterning
description: Aqua silk panel with a large scattered pattern of bamboo shoots and dogwood spray. At one end, band with woven Chinese inscription. Used as the lining fabric for 1960-5-1-a.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early–mid-20th century. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with twill patterning. 1960-5-1-b.
